text: Tomáš Pastor (born September 6, 1992) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for BK Mladá Boleslav of the Czech Extraliga. Pastor made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Vítkovice Steel during the 2012-13 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:BK Mladá Boleslav players Category:HC Vítkovice players Category:Czech ice hockey defencemen Category:Sioux Falls Stampede players
title: Tomáš Pastor
